Name: Shn!p
About the game: Shn!p is an original puzzler about clearing a field of dots. Complete over 150 levels that will have you popping dots off blockers, through blackholes, and many other special mechanics! FEATURES - Polished puzzle experience with satisfying explosions - 160 handcrafted levels - Special mechanics including blockers, color changers, black holes, magnets, and wormholes - Color blind friendly mode
